name: panel
description: Airlink is a simple to use Game server managment panel

scripts.build: tsc && copyfiles -u 1 src/views/**/* dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/public/**/* dist/ && tailwindcss -i src/public/styles.css -o dist/public/styles.css
scripts.clean: ts-node -e "import { existsSync, mkdirSync } from 'fs'; import { removeSync, readdirSync } from 'fs-extra'; if (!existsSync('dist')) mkdirSync('dist'); readdirSync('dist').forEach(dir => { if (dir !== 'storage') removeSync(`dist/${dir}`); });"
scripts.migrate:dev: npx prisma migrate dev --name db && npx prisma generate
scripts.migrate:deploy: npx prisma migrate deploy --name db && npx prisma generate
